wikipedia_page.main: Col Buchanan (born 1973 Lisburn, Northern Ireland) is a Northern Irish fantasy writer. His first two books are Farlander and Stands a Shadow.He lives in Lancaster, England.

response: * Col Buchanan, (born 1973) author of Farlander and Stands a Shadow
Farlander is the first book in the Heart of the World Series written by Col Buchanan.
Stands a Shadow is the second book in the Heart of the World Series written by Col Buchanan.Goodreads Review of Stands a ShadowStands a Shadow by Col Buchanan (2011)
